Title: Workspace-Level Private Link in Microsoft Fabric (Generally Available)
EnhancedContent:
In September, we introduced the [Fabric workspace-level Private Link (Preview)](https://blog.fabric.microsoft.com/blog/fabric-workspace-level-private-link-preview/), enabling customers to use APIs to set up and manage private connectivity to their Fabric workspaces at a finer grain.

Now, you can enable private workspace access and seamlessly interact with Fabric artifacts in these workspaces directly from the Fabric Portal, making it simpler to build, manage, and collaborate on data experiences securely and efficiently.

To learn more, refer to the [Private links for Fabric workspaces (preview)](https://learn.microsoft.com/fabric/security/security-workspace-level-private-links-overview), or the [Workspace outbound access protection (preview)](https://learn.microsoft.com/fabric/security/workspace-outbound-access-protection-overview) documentation.
Author: Microsoft Fabric Blog
